styles: .mobile-nav, .mobile-nav-tabs { border: 0 none; background: #ffffff; margin: 0; padding: 5px 0; height: 60px; z-index: 102; } .mobile-nav > ul, .mobile-nav-tabs > ul { width: 100%; display: inline-flex;
